name: Visual Studio Code
description:
See Visual Studio Code

A cross platform code editor with a strong community and extension selection.

As of .NET 6 it will be possible to build Maui applications. It is already possible to use it for many styles of projects. I would like to use this more than I currently do.

name: Xamarin Forms
description:
See Xamarin.Forms documentation

A cross platform mobile framework. Work in C# and deploy to Android IOS and UWP. Strongly encouraged to work in MVVM.

Being able to apply C# knowledge to mobile is a compelling aspect of this framework.

name: Elm
description:
See Elm

A language dedicated to building web applications using MVU. Wonderful error handling no runtime exceptions. Concerned about lack of drop in components.

name: Flutter
description:
See Flutter

A cross platform mobile and web framework using Dart. Friends have had great success with this framework on their projects. Wide range of components available and great community backing.
